title: Introduction to Web Development
description: Learn the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for beginners.
content: Web development starts with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Together, they help you build responsive and interactive websites.

title: Getting Started with AWS
description: Explore how to deploy and manage applications using AWS.
content: AWS provides services like EC2, S3, and RDS to build and scale applications.

title: JavaScript Best Practices
description: Tips and tricks for writing clean and efficient JavaScript code.
content: Use ES6+ features, modular functions, and consistent naming conventions for clean JS code.

title: Data Science Basics
description: Understand data analysis, visualization, and preprocessing techniques.
content: Data Science uses libraries like Pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib to explore and visualize data.

title: Machine Learning 101
description: Supervised vs Unsupervised learning explained with examples.
content: Supervised learning works with labeled data, while unsupervised learning identifies patterns in raw datasets.

title: Cybersecurity Essentials
description: Protect yourself from phishing, malware, and cyber attacks.
content: Cybersecurity keeps your systems safe with encryption, authentication, and monitoring tools.

title: DevOps Practices
description: CI/CD pipelines, Docker, and Kubernetes basics.
content: DevOps automates software delivery with tools like Jenkins, Docker, and Kubernetes.

title: AI in Daily Life
description: Applications of AI in healthcare, finance, and automation.
content: AI powers voice assistants, fraud detection, recommendation engines, and automation.

title: Introduction to Databases
description: Learn SQL and NoSQL database fundamentals.
content: SQL databases are structured, while NoSQL provides flexibility for unstructured data.

title: Building REST APIs
description: A step-by-step guide to designing RESTful APIs.
content: REST APIs use HTTP methods like GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE to exchange data.

title: Cloud Security Fundamentals
description: Best practices for securing cloud infrastructure.
content: Cloud security practices include IAM, firewalls, encryption, and monitoring tools.

title: Version Control with Git
description: Collaborate efficiently using Git and GitHub.
content: Git tracks source code changes, while GitHub enables collaboration and CI/CD.

title: Responsive Web Design
description: Make websites look great on all devices.
content: Responsive design uses media queries, flexible layouts, and grids for multi-device support.

title: Natural Language Processing
description: Understand the basics of NLP and text analysis.
content: NLP powers sentiment analysis, chatbots, and translation systems.

title: Introduction to Docker
content: Docker lets you package applications into containers, ensuring consistency across environments.

title: Kubernetes for Beginners
description: Learn how to orchestrate containers using Kubernetes.
content: Kubernetes automates deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications.
